game.name: Train Simulator: C-424
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Take the throttle of a notable, and memorable, Alco second-generation diesel – with Diesel Workshop’s striking Century 424 for Train Simulator Classic!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take the throttle of a notable, and memorable, Alco second-generation diesel – with Diesel Workshop’s striking Century 424 for Train Simulator Classic!
